title: Dr.Mundo The Mad man of Zaun
body:
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/6b/Dr._Mundo_Render.png

A VGU on this guy would be nice.

After the release of Akali’s VGU , Riot confirmed a new Champion Roadmap and im hoping i will see this Iconic champion on the list . Look at the picture i posted and tell me he doesnt need the VGU . His model is old as my grandma and about his outdated kit...i dont even want to talk .

replies.body:
{{champion:82}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:80}} are the new Trinity of Rework

Last one was {{champion:83}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:3}}

Look at Mordekaiser's model too

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/f1/Mordekaiser_Render.png/revision/latest?cb=20141221000514

2018 graphics from a billion dollar company btw

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

Man these models are so sad to look at when you have such iconic thematics and designs that just need proper polishment. 
Mundo looks like some really bad plastic bootleg figure of the hulk that doesn't even get the color right and Mordekaiser looks like a saturday morning cartoon character with gigantic pizza feet.

> [{quoted}](name=Gvt1,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=VE5y3T66,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-07-12T19:45:28.044+0000)
>
> Man these models are so sad to look at when you have such iconic thematics and designs that just need proper polishment. 
> Mundo looks like some really bad plastic bootleg figure of the hulk that doesn't even get the color right and Mordekaiser looks like a saturday morning cartoon character with gigantic pizza feet.

Exactly..

They deserve the VGU the most ..
mundos kit is fantastic he just needs a visual update

> [{quoted}](name=AugustHeatHaze,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=VE5y3T66,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-07-12T15:43:30.169+0000)
>
> mundos kit is fantastic he just needs a visual update

Only the Q is nice in my opinion the rest...
yea its subjective so you are free to not like it, i just like stat check champions lol.
I would love to see Kayle and Morg after akali tbh
He’s a Purple Poro that ate a bottle of steroids that fell out of Braum’s Pocket.  Lore.

> [{quoted}](name=Jetva,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=VE5y3T66,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-07-12T16:36:30.490+0000)
>
> He’s a Purple Poro that ate a bottle of steroids that fell out of Braum’s Pocket.  Lore.

He will get a new lore after his VGU
He already got new lore with the big Zaun update, though. Wouldn't rule out a new short story, however.
I think mundo will have his part. Maybe next year and I'm positive of it along with Morde and pantheon.
{{champion:10}} {{champion:25}}  duo update from one team and {{champion:81}} Visual update with minor gameplay changes is what gonna get announced next.

this is my bet also hehehe. 

Time do fly so so fast... remember the times we're just speculating/theorizing these VGU's...

You know Dr. Mundo?












Dr. Gundo
